import React from'react';import{CurrentUserContext}from'../contexts/CurrentUserContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Card(props){var card=props.card,onCardClick=props.onCardClick,onCardLike=props.onCardLike,onCardDelete=props.onCardDelete;var currentUser=React.useContext(CurrentUserContext);//сверяем айди карточки 
var isOwn=card.owner._id===currentUser._id;//класс, позволяющий при совпадении _.id удалить карточку
var cardDeleteButtonClassName="photo__trash ".concat(isOwn?'photo__trash_active':'photo__trash_hidden');//айди карточки 
var isLiked=card.likes.some(function(i){return i._id===currentUser._id;});//класс,позволяющий лайкнуть карточку
var cardLikeButtonClassName="photo__like ".concat(isLiked?'photo__like_active':'');function handleClick(){onCardClick(card);console.log(card);}function handleLikeClick(){onCardLike(card);}function handleDeleteClick(){onCardDelete(card);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"photo",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"photo__image-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:cardDeleteButtonClassName,onClick:handleDeleteClick,"aria-label":"\u0423\u0434\u0430\u043B\u0438\u0442\u044C",type:"button"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"photo__image photo__image_open",src:card.link,alt:card.name,name:"name",onClick:handleClick})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"photo__title",name:"link",children:card.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"photo__like-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:cardLikeButtonClassName,onClick:handleLikeClick,type:"button","aria-label":"\u041D\u0440\u0430\u0432\u0438\u0442\u0441\u044F"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"photo__like-counter"})]})]},card._id);}export default Card;
